constructor-arg.value: SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_name_eng, m.movie_name_rus, m.movie_year,m.movie_rating, group_concat(DISTINCT g.genre_name) genres, group_concat(DISTINCT c.country_name) countries FROM movies m JOIN movie_genres mg ON m.movie_id = mg.movie_id JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id JOIN movie_countries mc ON mc.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN countries c ON c.country_id = mc.country_id GROUP BY m.movie_id,m.movie_name_eng,m.movie_name_rus,m.movie_year,m.movie_rating

SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_name_eng, m.movie_name_rus, m.movie_year, m.movie_rating, mr.rating your_rating, group_concat(DISTINCT c.country_name) countries FROM movies m JOIN movie_countries mc ON mc.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN countries c ON c.country_id = mc.country_id LEFT JOIN movie_rating mr ON m.movie_id = mr.movie_id AND mr.user_id = ? WHERE m.movie_id = ? GROUP BY m.movie_id,m.movie_name_eng,m.movie_name_rus,m.movie_year,m.movie_rating,mr.rating
SELECT mr.movie_id, mr.review_id, mr.user_id, u.user_name, mr.review_text FROM movie_reviews mr JOIN users u ON mr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE mr.movie_id = ?
SELECT g.genre_id, genre_name FROM movie_genres mg JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE mg.movie_id = ?
